thread.title: Hurricane Joaquin slows down Trumpnado
thread.title_full: Hurricane Joaquin slows down Trumpnado - POLITICO

author: Jack Shafer
title: Hurricane Joaquin slows down Trumpnado
text:
Apparently it takes a hurricane to keep Donald Trump from the trail. Trump announced Thursday that he is canceling a Friday evening rally in Virginia Beach, Virginia, because of safety concerns, as Hurricane Joaquin bears down on much of the East Coast this weekend.
Story Continued Below
"While we were expecting 10,000 people based on demand, and it would have been a happening, everyone's safety is of far more importance to me," the GOP presidential candidate said in a statement. "We will reschedule the event very soon and I look forward to being there."
Trump: I won't stay in the race if I start tanking By Eliza Collins
The Trump campaign did not immediately respond to a request for comment inquiring as to the rescheduled date.
Virginia Gov. Terry McAuliffe declared a state of emergency in the commonwealth on Wednesday evening in response to flooding earlier in the week and the prospect of more severe weather this weekend.
